successes.title: Zombicide: Season 2
successes.description: The follow up to the hit boardgame of 2012! More Zombie action with tons of great miniatures and fast paced rules!

Pledges.description: Contaminated - A copy of Toxic City Mall delivered straight to your door upon release! Note, you'll need either Zombicide Season 1 or Prison Outbreak to play.
Inmate - A copy of Prison Outbreak + Zombie Dogz, and any stretch goals applicable. Also includes Brad and his Zombivor version, a Kickstarter exclusive. Early Bird special!
Inmate - A copy of Prison Outbreak + Zombie Dogz, and any stretch goals applicable. Also includes Brad and his Zombivor version, a Kickstarter exclusive.

Fugitive - A copy of Prison Outbreak + Toxic City Mall + Zombie Dogz and any stretch goals applicable. The complete Season 2 experience! Also includes Brad and his Zombivor version, a Kickstarter exclusive. Early Bird special!

Fugitive - A copy of Prison Outbreak + Toxic City Mall + Zombie Dogz and any stretch goals applicable. Also includes Brad and his Zombivor version, a Kickstarter exclusive.The complete Season 2 experience!

Raise the Dead - A copy of Zombicide Season 1 + Prison Outbreak + Toxic City Mall + Zombie Dogz and any stretch goals applicable. If you missed Zombicide, here's everything in one swoop! Also includes Brad and his Zombivor version, a Kickstarter exclusive. Early Bird special!

Raise the Dead - A copy of Zombicide Season 1 + Prison Outbreak + Toxic City Mall + Zombie Dogz and any stretch goals applicable.  Also includes Brad and his Zombivor version, a Kickstarter exclusive. If you missed Zombicide, here's everything in one swoop!
I am Zombie - Everything in the Fugitive pledge level (and applicable stretch goals) and get featured as a Zombie in Season 3!
I am Legend - Everything in the Fugitive pledge level (and applicable stretch goals) and get featured as a Survivor and Zombivor in Season 3!
